channel.title: Dementhium pk tokens rep++
channel.description:
so i have done everything like the shop and when a player dies they get 2 tokens for they're efforts ect.. i just dont know where to put the [code] player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 10); player.sendMessage("You are rewarded 10 PvP tokens.");[/code]
i have searched all of skills.java cant figure it out help is nice rep++

And it already gives 2 pk tickets when you die correct?
So you’re trying to make it so when they kill someone they get 10 points…
uhm, Does it send a message when you kill someone?
Also search the same file for “o.”
I’m used to 508 so i could be wrong here.

item.title: Dementhium pk tokens rep++
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

in skills.java when they die in pvp they get 2pk tokens player.animate(9055); Prayer.wrathEffect(player, player.getCombatExecutor().getLastAttacker()); Prayer.retributionEffect(player, player.getCombatExecutor().getLastAttacker()); player.removeTick("nex_virus"); player.submitTick("death_tick", new Tick(4) { @Override public void execute() { stop(); dead = false; for (int i = 0; i < SKILL_COUNT; i++) { set(i, getLevelForExperience(i)); } hitPoints = getMaxHitpoints(); player.animate(Animation.RESET); player.getPrayer().closeAllPrayers(); player.sendMessage("Oh dear, you have died."); ActionSender.sendConfig(player, 1240, hitPoints * 2); player.setSpecialAmount(1000); player.resetCombat(); player.getPoisonManager().removePoison(); player.setAttribute("teleblock", 0); player.setAttribute("freezeTime", 0); Mob killer = player.getDamageManager().getKiller(); if (player.getLocation().homesafepk(player)) {//In a safe activity we don't drop items or teleport to the DEFAULT_LOCATION, this will be done in the onDeath method. player.teleport(Mob.DEFAULT); } if (!player.getActivity().onDeath(player)) { //In a safe activity we don't drop items or teleport to the DEFAULT_LOCATION, this will be done in the onDeath method. if (killer != null && killer != player) { if (player.getRights() != 2) { player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 2); player.sendMessage("You are rewarded 2 tokens for your efforts."); GraveStoneManager.appendDeath(player, killer); } }

Read full topic

“die” “death” or if the server gives you a message when you die, search that, and wherever it is. add that

P.S quotes are messing up
